Schoolchildren celebrate anniversary
articles.content:
Schoolchildren celebrate anniversary
    Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- An art performance was given at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Thursday by those who had won prizes at a national schoolchildren's vocal, instrumental and dance solo contest to mark the second anniversary of the leader Kim Jong Il's election as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
   The numbers such as dance solo "Long Live Marshal Kim Jong Il" and male vocal solo "The Marshal Represents the World" vividly depicted the schoolchildren's boundless joy and happiness to have Kim Jong Il as General Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.    
   The performers also wonderfully represented deep gratitude and reverence for Kim Jong Il, who stands in the van of the building of a powerful nation and shows all loving care for the Korean people.

"Complete collection of Kim Il Sung's Works"  vol. 28 published
articles.content:
"Complete collection of Kim Il Sung's Works"  vol. 28 published
     Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea publishing house brought out "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" vol. 28, a library of the great Juche idea, which carries famous works of the respected leader Kim Il Sung in chronological order.
   The volume contains 22 famous works  including historic speeches, concluding speeches  and talks made by Kim Il Sung,  while leading the Korean revolution to victory with his outstanding and tested leadership in each period of the revolutionary development, from October, Juche 50 (1961) to January, Juche 51 (1962).

Repression of students in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repression of students in S. Korea
    Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The South Korean authorities reportedly arrested Kim Thae Gyun, chairman of the general student council of a faculty of the science and technology board on the strength of the notorious "security law."
   They issued a warrant of arrest in July and searched for him for the mere reason that he has been a deputy to the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils.    
   On October 6 they walked him away when he was in a sit-in in front of the student hall in protest against the repression of campus movement.

Greetings between foreign ministers of Korea and China
articles.content:
Greetings between foreign ministers of Korea and China
     Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Minister exchanged a message of greetings with the Chinese Foreign Minister on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Korea and China.
   Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun in the message expressed the belief that the traditional relations of friendship between Korea and China would strengthen in the common interests of the two peoples, and wished the Chinese people new success in the work for socialist construction with Chinsese characteristics and for the reunification of the whole country.    
   Foreign Minister Tang  Jiaxuan in the message sincerely hoped that the traditional Sino-Korean friendly and cooperative relations would steadily develop, and wished the Korean people new and greater success in the cause of socialist construction and the struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
